title: Distributed and Massed Practice Strategies for Mathematics Fluency Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
context.additional_context: Learners engage in short-cycle repeated practice via mobile devices, aiming to improve mathematical fluency through solving everyday problems

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in solving basic computational problems through 15-minute daily mobile exercises over two weeks.
Learners demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in accuracy from baseline in a follow-up assessment after four weeks using distributed practice strategies.
Learners apply at least three math fluency strategies suitable for everyday life scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
